title.text: Statistics Based Hybrid Approach to Chinese Base Phrase Identification

abstractContent.text: This paper extends the base noun phrase(BNP) identification into a research on Chinese base phrase identification.
ARer briefly introducing some basic concepts on Chinese base phrase, this paper presents a statistics based hybrid model for identifying 7 types of Chinese base phrases in view.
Experiments show the efficiency of the proposed method in simplifying sentence structure.
Significance of the research hes in it provides a solid foundation for the Chinese parser.

introductionContent.text: Decomposing syntactic analysis into several phases so as to decrease its difficulty is anew stream in NIP research.
The successful POS tagging has encouraged researchers to explore further possibility for resolving sub-problems in parsing).
The typical examples are the recognition of BaseNP in English and Chinese.
